product_name: Voile Splitboard Crampons for Light Rail
long_description: Increase your traction when touring on your splitboard with the Voile Splitboard Crampons for Light Rail. These crampons work with Voile Light Rail Splitboard Bindings made in 2012/2013 or later.
short_description: Increase your traction when touring on your splitboard with the Voile Splitboard Crampons for Light Rail. These crampons work with Voile Light Rail Splitboard Bindings made in 2012/2013 or later.
